name: Alchemist's Crescendo
description:
Submission for Metroidvania Month 15 GameJam

You've been captured and experimented on by an evil lord looking to combine magic an science. In one such experiment, you were turned into a mouse.

Before being captured you considered yourself an amateur alchemist, and now you'll have to use alchemy to try to turn back into a human and escape. Find elements and combine them at an alchemist's table. 

You can restore your health and healing potions at an alchemist's table as well.

Controls:

Movement: WASD

Jump: Spacebar

Throw Potion/ Select: Left Click

Drink Consumable Potion: F

Inventory: I

Open Crafting Menu (at table): E

This is the first game I've ever made that wasn't for a school project, and I rushed it really bad because elden ring came out at the same time as this game jam
